document.title: Hip-Hop Hooray? Or Hip-Hell No?!
document.abstract: The images in today's hip-hop have become even more graphic in its solicitation of images that portray violence against women and the continued destruction of the black community all in the name of "Hustlin." This workshop will attempt to create much needed dialogue concerning the psychological effects of these images as well as come up with strategies on how to demand that there be a balance added to the music.

field.name: location
field.value: Carolyn P. Brown Memorial University Center
